page.title: 02Agriculture
page.content:
There are 11 farms in the Saughall area.The crop which they all grow is grass.The land the farmers own all amounts up to 1091 acres.2 farms have 145 acres,and the rest have 200 acres,60 acres,144 acres,52 acres,160 acres,150 acres,130 acres,and 50 acres.
3 farms grow wheat,2 farms grow barley,5 farms grow grass,1 farm doesn't grow any crops or plants at all.
10 of the farms have their land used for pasture.The other farm has pasture and silage.5 farms have cows,1 farm has cows and pigs,1 farm owns 3 ponies and the other farm owns sheep,calves and cows.
